title: Do not engage in protests during exam period: PUCSL
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has requested the public to refrain from protesting by blocking roads except on Sundays from tomorrow (23) until June 1st.
The request has been made in view of the ongoing G.C.E. Ordinary level examinations.
